nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@return the address of the owner.
nodes.name: owner

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: @return true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.
nodes.name: isOwner
renounceOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: _transferOwnership

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, reverts on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, reverts on overflow.
nodes.name: add

nodes.documentation:
@dev Divides two numbers and returns the remainder (unsigned integer modulo),
reverts when dividing by zero.
nodes.name: mod

nodes.documentation: @notice Constructor to create a HydroToken
@return Whether the transfer was successful or not
nodes.name: transfer

nodes.documentation: @return True if the transfer was successful
nodes.name: transferFrom

nodes.documentation: @return True if the transfer was successful
nodes.name: doTransfer

nodes.documentation: @return The balance of `_owner`
nodes.name: balanceOf

nodes.documentation: @return True if the approval was successful
nodes.name: approve

nodes.documentation: to spend

constructor.details: The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender account.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
